Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Cell

  • public class Cell
extends greenfoot.Actor
    These are the cells of the CA. They save their last states to allow for parallel reevaluation of neighboring cells.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell(int cellSize)
      Create the cell body's image and initialize state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      On first execution, find and save neighboring cell references.
      void flipState()
      Flip the state of the cell.
      boolean getState()
      Get the state of the cell.
      void saveLastState()
      Save the previous state in preparation for the next time step.
      void setState(boolean state)
      Set the state of the cell.

      • act

        public void act()
        On first execution, find and save neighboring cell references. After that, do nothing unless directed by LangtonAnt.
